rows.label: qev018901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmmm. I'm kind of dismayed. I am supposed to be so
very very happy, aren't I? And yet something feels...off.
Weird. You know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Can I ask for some gold-tier advice, my most most
loyal VVIP member?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0003
rows.name: Is there anything more valuable than money?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0011
rows.name: List off many things that are more valuable than money.

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0021
rows.name: Proclaim that nothing is more valuable than money.

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Friendship? Dreams? The future of mankind?
You are a fan of vague abstracts, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0005
rows.name:
But you claim that as long as you have those things,
money does not matter so much? Interesting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0006
rows.name:
I recently discovered something truly precious, you see?
It's a new round edible called...pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh, you know it? ...Well, money is so so simple.
A very very obvious way to score my alchemy engines.
A simple point tally, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0008
rows.name:
But it just seems less and less important ever since I
discovered the round edible you call...pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0009
rows.name:
A single bite fills me with more joy than amassing
several hundred million in credits. It's so so good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0010
rows.name:
I suddenly feel like a lifetime of pizza is all I need to
be really really happy, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0011
rows.name:
And working my life away without stopping to smell
the pizzas sounds very very...stupid, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell May May it might be time for a break.

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0040
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0041
rows.name:
Chastise May May for abandoning
those who depend on her.

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0012
rows.name:
Do you know I've been waiting to hear you say that
for a very very long time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thank you, goldest of gold members.
I've made up my mind now, haven't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Mmm... I suppose I only made this much money
because people needed my alchemy engines, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Thank you, gold-tier friend. I lost sight of something
important, didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'll retool my marvelous alchemy engines to be fully
automatic and then retire. Good plan, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Then I can eat pizza here forever and be so so so
incredibly happy all the time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0018
rows.name:
And I just need 50 more pieces of aurorite to do it,
okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh, and 20 more pieces of arc sand ore, yes?
So will you go find them for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0020
rows.name:
In return, I'll invent the greatest of VVIP ranks with the
greatest of exchange rates...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0021
rows.name:
PLATINUM tier! So you'll help me, right?
You'll help send me to pizza paradise?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0022
rows.name:
I will be waiting here, yes? Eating pizza. Lots.
So, um, hurry back, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0023
rows.name:
As soon as I have those materials, I'll get started on
my last and final job, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Ah, so so delicious! Pizza is a miracle my mouth was
never prepared to witness, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Earning a hundred million credits never tasted anywhere
near this good, did it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0026
rows.name:
I want to marry it with my face, if that's possible.
Er, so please bring what I asked for so I can focus
on my life's newfound purpose, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0027
rows.name:
Aaaaaah... Wooow! This is the end times of tastiness,
isn't it? An apocalyptic delight, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0028
rows.name:
My pizza buddy Pfeffen introduced me to this new
type of pizza called grenade pizza, you see?
Have you tried it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0029
rows.name:
It's too too too tasty. Like a soul-searing explosion of
happiness in my mouth, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod happily.

rows.label: qev018901_JNK0060
rows.name: Report In

rows.label: qev018901_SEL0061
rows.name: Give May May her delivery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0030
rows.name:
Then you're another pizza buddy as well, aren't you?
That almost makes me as happy as grenade pizza
does! ...Almost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0031
rows.name:
...Oh, that's right. I need to automatize my alchemy
engines as fast as possible, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0032
rows.name:
Then we can talk about our love for pizza all day
without watching the clock, yes? Yes. Yeeesss![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0033
rows.name:
So did you gather the materials I asked for?
Can we be done with all this bothersome work stuff?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0034
rows.name:
Ack! I totally completely forgot about that entirely,
didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0035
rows.name:
Then let's automatize these alchemy engines and enjoy
some leisurely pizza time, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0036
rows.name:
So, um, can I have the materials I requested, perhaps?
Er, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0037
rows.name:
Thank you! I'll have those tweaks done very very soon,
yes? So soon. Momentarily, perhaps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0038
rows.name:
Then the Shimmer & Savvy Financial Group can
function just fine without me, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0039
rows.name:
Thank you for all your help so far, though.
You're my very first platinum VVIP member, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0040
rows.name:
I hope you'll keep using the SSFG's miranium
conversion service, okay? Using it a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Though I doubt I'll bother helping anyone but you in
the future, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0042
rows.name:
Oh, and I donated all my non-pizza money to
BLADE HQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0043
rows.name:
I hope it'll help you help the city help all of us!
...Er, right? I think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0044
rows.name: ...Hmm? Why donate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0045
rows.name:
Because I need New LA to stay safe if I want an
uninterrupted supply of pizza, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0046
rows.name:
Giving my money to you and the others who keep the
city safe is very very smart. So smart, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018901_MSG0047
rows.name:
Please keep up the good work so I can keep
enjoying pizza in peace, okay?[ST:wait ]
